data.name: Swim Meet
data.detailed_description: Rei needs to train for the Olympics.
data.about_the_game: Rei needs to train for the Olympics.
data.short_description: Rei needs to train for the Olympics.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP or Newer
  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.50 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X version Leopard 10.5.8 or later
  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X version Leopard 10.6 or later
  • Processor: 2.50 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 +
  • Processor: 2.50 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
All characters depicted within this game are over 18.

The game includes suggestive scenes as well as some partial nudity with characters in their underwear/lingerie or revealing clothing. Romance and Intimacy and some adult language are also included throughout.
